amendment.description: Amendment allowed States the option to provide for more frequent and in-depth inspection of historic bridges in lieu of their replacement under the 5-year performance plan outlined in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in part B of House Report 110-760 to allow a state performance plan to provide for increased inspection of a historic bridge rather than rehabilitation or replacement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
